text.div:
Reindex

OPERATION: Get a list of resources changed since a given point

The changes operation reads resource changes from the RESOURCE_CHANGE_LOG and returns their URLs in a bundle.

URL: [base]/$changes

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
OUTreturn1..1OperationOutcome

If the operation outcome does not list any errors, then the server expected to be healthy.

name: Changes
description: The changes operation fetches resource which have been changed.

parameter.name: resourceCount
parameter.documentation: The maximum number of resource URLs to return in one call.

parameter.name: tstamp
parameter.documentation: Fetch changes on or after the given date/timestamp. Format as a date YYYY-MM-DD or time YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:DDZ.

parameter.name: resourceId
parameter.documentation: Fetch changes after the given resourceId. Long represented as a string.

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.documentation: Fetch changes only for the given resource type
